REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Bully
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] childhood stealing other kids' lunch money.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Farm kid
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a farm. [PAWN_pronoun] played with sticks and had many pets. Life on the farm wasn't always fun and games for [PAWN_objective] however, [PAWN_pronoun] had to learn how to carry [PAWN_possessive] own weight and perform a wide variety of necessary tasks.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Fat kid
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was always picked last in gym, which made [PAWN_objective] sad. [PAWN_nameDef] ate because [PAWN_pronoun] was sad and [PAWN_pronoun] was sad because [PAWN_pronoun] ate.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Mascot
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: High school was rough, especially in the team's unvented mascot costume. Not only did [PAWN_nameDef] spend the majority of [PAWN_possessive] high school days in the hot stuffy suit, but [PAWN_pronoun] got used to it! Being the mascot came with its perks but plenty of downsides. Due to being the school mascot [PAWN_pronoun] was ridiculed and became a social outcast. [PAWN_pronoun] also became more than a bit abrasive towards new people.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Medieval witch
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] became interested in alchemy when [PAWN_pronoun] was 5 years old. By the time [PAWN_pronoun] was 9 [PAWN_pronoun] had already created a cure for cancer. However, the church deemed [PAWN_possessive] work witch craft, sentencing [PAWN_objective] to be frozen in ice so that [PAWN_possessive] spirit may never see redemption.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Military cadet
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a cadet in the Colonial College of Military Warfare from the age of 16. Following in [PAWN_possessive] family's tradition, [PAWN_pronoun] studied and sucessfully completed [PAWN_possessive] training, picking up a few key skills on the way.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Miner kid
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up with two miners for parents. [PAWN_pronoun] listened to them speak to their friends about all the wonderous things they saw deep in the bowels of the planet. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] entire life learning and dreaming about becoming a miner and exploring all kinds of caverns.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Officer cadet
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a cadet in the Colonial Officer Training College from the age of 16. Having completed sucessfully [PAWN_pronoun] picked up a few key skills and learned how to lead and combat threats from a strategical and tactical point of view.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Pet sitter
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] loved animals and spent a good amount of [PAWN_possessive] time looking after other people's pets. They always seemed to like [PAWN_objective].

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Runaway
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] decided at a early age [PAWN_pronoun] did not want to be where [PAWN_pronoun] was so [PAWN_pronoun] took off and never looked back.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Sandbox architect
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent all of [PAWN_possessive] time as a child playing in the sandbox. While children would pile up a mound of sand in the center of the box and call it a castle and then immediately destroy it, [PAWN_nameDef] designed and built beautiful castles with courtyards and walls with crenellations punctuated by towers. [PAWN_pronoun] often got into fist fights with the children when they tried to destroy [PAWN_possessive] work.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Super hero
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was your typical super hero who went around saving cats in distress and helping old ladies cross the street. [PAWN_pronoun] always lost [PAWN_possessive] lunch money to the villain though.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Tester
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] has always been interested in testing things. Ever since [PAWN_pronoun] was young, [PAWN_pronoun] has been fiddling with and testing things.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Vatgrown engineer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was vat-grown as an engineer in an illegal urbworld laboratory. As a young child, [PAWN_pronoun] was taught to tinker, build, and research. For most of [PAWN_possessive] childhood, [PAWN_pronoun] knew nothing else.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Vatgrown slave
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was vat-grown as a slave in an illegal urbworld laboratory. As a young child, [PAWN_pronoun] was taught only to cook, clean, and serve [PAWN_possessive] masters. For most of [PAWN_possessive] childhood, [PAWN_pronoun] knew nothing else.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Young cancer survivor
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Sad truth is even kids get cancer. [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the unlucky children afflicted. Preventing [PAWN_objective] from interacting much with other children [PAWN_pronoun] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] time working on arts and crafts.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Young reader
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] always liked to read books... as many as [PAWN_pronoun] could find... a whole lot many books. But [PAWN_pronoun] didn't have many friends, because [PAWN_pronoun] didn't have time for them.
